api.v1.routes package

api.v1.routes.error_handler module

Custom error handler for API routes.

exception api.v1.routes.error_handler.AnswersMisMatchQuestion(n_questions, n_answers)[source]

Bases: Exception

Exception raised when the number of provided answers mismatches the number of questions.

Attributes:

n_questions (int): Number of expected questions. n_answers (int): Number of provided answers.

exception api.v1.routes.error_handler.PathTypeMisMatch(type_)[source]

Bases: Exception

Exception raised for wrong query type.

Attributes:

type_ (type): Type of the query.

Bases: Exception

Exception raised for unknown section ID.

Attributes:

section_id (int): ID of the unknown section.

Bases: Exception

Exception raised for unknown section name.

Attributes:

exception api.v1.routes.error_handler.VectorIndexError(e)[source]

Bases: Exception

Attributes:
